full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BLO SBYONG DON BDUN MA'I KHRID YIG MDOR BSDUS SU BKOD PA BKA' GDAMS SNYING PO GTONG LEN GYI TSIG BCAD DANG BCAS PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @015B (CES BLO SBYONG DON BDUN MA'I KHRID YIG MDOR BSDUS SU BKOD PA BKA' GDAMS SNYING PO ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, MI PHYED PA'I DAD PA DANG LDAN PA PHYUG PO NOR BU SRI THAR GYIS RGYANG RING PO NAS BSKUL ZHING, ,CHOS TSUL 'DI LA NYAMS LEN SNYING POR MDZAD BZHED PA MANG POR YANG PHAN DU RE BA'I BSAM PAS DGE SLONG YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN GYIS, ,BAL BOD MTSAMS KYI DBEN GNAS BKRA SHIS BSAM GTAN GLING DU SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG THUB PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE MI NUB PA'I RGYAL MTSAN DU GYUR CIG , ,,)
